title: Desk Mobility Flow
desc: This seated stretch sequence refreshes your body, especially during long focus periods. A short mobility flow clears physical tension, supporting sustained mental focus.
instructions: Neck rolls: slow circles, both directions (30s)
Shoulder shrugs and rolls (30s)
Seated spinal twist left and right (30s each)
Seated hamstring stretch (30s each leg)

title: Focus-Boost Walk
desc: Walking at a brisk, deliberate pace stimulates the brain and body, improving clarity and creativity. Do this between deep work blocks.
instructions: Walk briskly for 3 minutes, breathe deeply, and observe your pace.

title: Power Pose Circuit
desc: Engage your body in open, confident stances. These poses activate alertness, boost mood, and support psychological readiness.
instructions: Stand tall with hands on hips (1 min)
Arms overhead wide and open (1 min)
Lunge position with hands up (30s each side)

title: Breath & Movement Sync
desc: Connect breath with simple motion. Inhale and reach up, exhale and fold forward. This fluid movement regulates your nervous system.
instructions: Inhale: arms overhead
Exhale: fold forward
Repeat slowly for 5 rounds

title: Wall Sit Reset
desc: A short wall sit engages large muscle groups and shifts mental focus to the present. This is perfect when you feel restless or foggy.
instructions: Lean against a wall and hold a squat for 1 minute. Rest and repeat once.

title: Box Breathing
desc: Use box breathing to reduce anxiety and heighten focus. This practice is used by athletes and leaders under pressure.
instructions: Inhale 4s
Hold 4s
Exhale 4s
Hold 4s
Repeat 5 rounds

title: Focus Word Chant
desc: Pick a word that represents your goal ('focus', 'calm', etc). Repeat it silently or aloud to anchor attention.
instructions: Repeat your focus word slowly for 3 minutes, syncing with your breath.

title: Micro Meditation: Single Point Focus
desc: Train your brain to focus on one thing. Choose a point (a candle, dot, or breath) and hold attention there.
instructions: Focus on a single point for 2 minutes. Redirect gently when distracted.

title: Intent Journaling
desc: Writing a one-sentence intention organizes your thoughts and sets direction.
instructions: Write down: What is the one thing I want to complete in the next hour?

title: Clarity Check-In
desc: Self-checks reorient your energy. This short exercise brings clarity to what matters now.
instructions: Ask: What am I doing? Why? Is this the most valuable thing I can do now?
Take a breath, then act.

title: Peer Sync Check-In
desc: Aligning with a peer sharpens focus and accountability. This 2-minute check-in reinforces shared goals.
instructions: Message a teammate: 'What's your main goal for this hour?' Share yours too.

title: Body Double Session Start
desc: Start a silent co-working session with someone. Accountability and presence improve deep focus.
instructions: Connect on video or audio and say your current task. Work silently for 5 minutes.

title: Micro Feedback Exchange
desc: Brief, constructive feedback deepens engagement. Exchanging quick notes boosts clarity.
instructions: Ask someone for a one-line review of your current task. Offer one in return.

title: Voice Note Update
desc: Record a short voice note update about your goal today. Speaking thoughts aloud enhances commitment.
instructions: Send a voice note to a trusted peer: 'Today Iâ€™m focused on ____.'

title: Pomodoro Sync Pair
desc: Commit to a Pomodoro (25-min work block) with a partner. Begin with a shared start and a 5-minute prep.
instructions: Message a friend: 'Starting a Pomodoro now. Join?' Then prep for 5 minutes.

title: Digital Clean Start
desc: Quickly clear your desktop and close unneeded tabs. This eliminates digital clutter and enhances clarity.
instructions: Close all tabs unrelated to your task. Clear notifications. Open only 1-2 focus tools.

title: Distraction Audit
desc: Track your recent distractions. Awareness is the first step to control.
instructions: List the last 3 things that pulled your attention away. Reflect why.

title: Focus App Launch
desc: Start a productivity or mindfulness app intentionally. This builds a digital ritual around focus.
instructions: Launch your focus app. Set a short timer or activate deep work mode.

title: Notification Fast
desc: Pause all notifications for a short time. This builds your focus muscle through intentional constraint.
instructions: Set device to Do Not Disturb or Focus Mode for 1 hour.

title: Focus Mode Toggle
desc: Activating a dedicated focus mode reduces friction and conditions your brain to enter work state.
instructions: Toggle your custom Focus Mode or use app blocker for 30 minutes.
